Text: Seen it years ago, great movie! Thanx alot!! :)

Downloading it now and I promise to seed.  I do plan to buy the DVD when I can afford it but I'd like to have  this in the meantime. I saw this film for the first time late last night thanks to my TiVo, and I was positively stunned by it. I agree with you: EVERYONE should see this movie.
Just a great film. Not to mention (as no one has yet) Danial Lanois did the soundtrack. Really great stuff. Thanks again, i'll be seeding this one for a while!
